channel.title: Exec Plugins on Omniview - The Integration DevOps Environment
channel.description: Recent content in Exec Plugins on Omniview - The Integration DevOps Environment

item.title: Overview
item.description: Exec plugins provide capabilities for executing commands and providing shell access to resources. Exec plugins provide a means to authenticate to a machine that can be used to execute commands. This is useful for tasks such as running scripts, gathering information, or executing commands on remote systems. The Omniview core provides three primary built-in exec plugins: Local SSH Docker However, you can also create custom exec plugins to support other protocols or systems.
